metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9986 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The intr function in sound/oss/msnd_pinnacle.c in the Linux kernel through 4.11.7 allows local users to cause a denial of service (over-boundary access) or possibly have unspecified other impact by changing the value of a message queue head pointer between two kernel reads of that value, aka a "double fetch" vulnerability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9986` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> unfixed as of 2017-08-24 OSS msnd pinnacle driver, Ubuntu kernels have OSS drivers disabled.
